SENT.plain: A boy with Down syndrome who developed myelodysplastic syndrome after regression of transient abnormal myelopoiesis (TAM) is described
His blast cells in TAM had other chromosome abnormalities in addition to trisomy 21;50,XY,+21c,+12,+14,+21
Serial chromosome analysis in follow-up showed abnormal clones involving monosomy 7
Because two clones had different karyotypes, they might have derived from different clones
